description: Rafe is the older brother of Audrey and Kathryn. He`s a talented Pok√©mon trainer that competed in the Battle Tower. He`s generally calm, but can show hints of arrogance. Along with his Blaziken, he helped fend off the clones of Deoxys and help free the abducted citizens of LaRousse City. He also assisted restoring energy to the city to regenerate Deoxys` body.
name: Ryuu
